name: @googlemaps/code-assist-mcp

scripts.build: bun clean && bun build index.ts --outdir dist --target=node
scripts.build:prepare: bun clean && bun build index.ts --outdir dist --target=node --format=cjs --minify && { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat dist/index.js; } > dist/index.js.tmp && mv dist/index.js.tmp dist/index.js && shx chmod +x dist/index.js && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/package.json && cp README.md dist
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:prepare && zip -r dist_$(date +%Y%m%d).zip dist

description: Google Maps Platform Code Assist MCP (Model Context Protocol) service
